places_with_reviews.name: Hindustan Resort
address: Hindustan resort, At post, near modi green house, Guhagar, Are, Maharashtra 415703, India

reviews.text:
Decent stay, stayed here for 2 nights.
Reasonably prices,
Room and washroom were clean,
Food was tasty and Reasonably priced.
The plantation in the resort is very nice, very nice for morning and evening walks.
Overall Nice place for couple and family,
Highly Recommended.
Too good for the price, just 5 cottages ample space, awesome food and customized order. Rohit the host just 21 yr old kid but what a experience we had.

The location is 15 mins away from Guhagar beach.

The most affordable and calm place to live around. The service is top notch & food is really good.

Quite spacious rooms to relax and spend time with your loved ones.

Well maintain Resort, clean and neat rooms.location is awesome. If you want peace then this is perfect destination for you. Staff is very much helpful. Owner Rohit is so humbled. Food quality is superb and rate also reasonable. No network issue. Wifi is available. Blindly go for it.

Rooms 5/5
Food 5/5
Location 5/5
Hospitality 5/5

Thanks Rohit and Abhijit sir for making our stay memorable.

I would highly highly recommend this place as everything from service to private room stay with a private porch and greenary and service provided by Rohit was perfectly A class. We enjoyed the homemade food for dinner and breakfast and the staff are very cordial and friendly and the added feature of animals around makes the place more homely and beautiful.
Special thanks to Rohit for being so hospitable.
The stay was amazing.
Highly recommend

places_with_reviews.name: Sea bliss resort
address: At post, taluka, guhagar, Anjanwel, Maharashtra 415634, India

reviews.text: Very close to sea water that you can hear voice of waves . Authentic food served by owner was delicious.  Rooms were so clean and fresh feeling inside.  You can get to see some points very close to Hitel . Must visit atheist once with. Friends for chill- out.
Perfect stay to enjoy sea view and authentic Konkani food . Many places to visit like Light house, Fort etc are also very close by.

A charming and cosy family-run hotel situated in a scenic coastal village right by the sea. All rooms have a sea view and it’s an idyllic place to relax. The food is just too good! The family cooks proper authentic Konkani meals that will leave you wanting for more. I stayed for a long weekend and couldn’t have been more relaxed and well-fed than here.
Very nice place, beutiful and clean rooms,the quality of food is too good and very fast service,you should visit once.....

A nice hotel run by a family, situated very close to sea in picturesque village atmosphere. The hotel is maintained well and still being improved. Homely meals is something we truly enjoyed. The hotel is also situated fairly close to Dhopave Ferry crossing from where one can easily go towards Dapoli, Murud, Shree Harihareshwar, Mumbai etc on one side and of course Chiplun and Ratnagiri exits are very close from the other side. We enjoyed our stay and recommend the same for families.

places_with_reviews.name: White Sand Retreat
address: Are Village, Guhagar-Veldur Road, Taluka, near Dhardevi Temple, Guhagar, Mouje Anjanvel, Maharashtra 415703, India

reviews.text:
The rooms and services are very good, only the location is far away from main area, beach or village. The transport not available here, You must be book private vehicles, taxis or auto's to go there.They are expensive.
The sunset or sunrise are shown from room.The jio network is available here but internet work slowly. The food is also good in taste. They serve Thali having variety of vegatebles, sweet, roti, dal rice, salad and papad.

Great host Mr. Chaitanya, great on property staff - Mr. Jadhav. Nice clean cozy rooms.
Situated on a small hillock away from the hustle and bustle of Guhagar town.
Only issue could be beach is at 20 - 25 mins walking distance and Vyadeshwar temple is 15 mins ride.

Best rooms and room service
Good food and ambiance
Thank you Santosh kaka for good food as well....
Will definitely coming back

White Sand Retreat is a perfect home away from home. Right from the booking stage till we vacate, there is a touch of professionalism.
The resort is located just off the SH4 and has multiple row houses.  There is adequate Parking space infront of the row house. As soon as you reach, the host Santosh Jadhav is ready to receive you and ensure guests are comfortably checked into the row house.
The interior design of the row house is exquisite, fabulous. Within an area of 250sq.ft, the row house has everything you need or look for. It can comfortably accommodate a family of 4. Each  row house has 2 rooms one on the ground floor and another on 1st floor with internal staircase to reach. Both rooms have independent Washroom ( hot water geyser), Split AC, fans, TV, balcony for sit out etc. First floor room has Master Bed ( with ward robe) while ground floor room has sofa cum extendable double bed.
Rooms are sparkling clean, with cleaner linen, towels etc. They do provide soaps and dental kit.  Each row house has a small lawn at the front for sitting out and each row house has fencing for privacy. Salute to the person who has designed and organised the row houses, perfect for family of 4. And all above is pocket friendly too.
The resort has inbuilt Kitchen Serving variety of veg & non veg food. Taste is superb. There is a foldable dining table with 4 chairs inside the room for comfortable and relaxed dining experience. Santosh and his team are avaible at the premises 24x7 to cater to every need of the guests. Service is outstanding.
All in all, it is truly an exhilarating experience to spend a brief vacation with family at White Sand Resort. Would love to go back once more.

Each and every aspect of the resort be it the ambience, the staff and location is just amazing. Especially, the food you get to eat is so delicious. Totally worth spending the time and money here. Our team had a good time here and would love to come again.

address: Baji road, Bramhanwadi, Arey, Guhagar, G5CW+XHW, Are, Maharashtra 415719, India

reviews.text:
The best place to relax amidst lush green trees combined with very humble host couple Mr n Mrs Dixit. YOU WILL NOT FEEL LIKE GOING BACK.

Guhaghar beach is close

Very awesome place. I would love to stay here.
Peaceful. In the lap of nature. Must visit request to every nature lover. No TV, No internet. Njoy your stay
Nice place amidst lush green nature. Place is near guhagar beach. Awesome host and nice food. It was peaceful and serene. Surely stay again !!
Good stay, spacious rooms.., Authentic Traditional food served at breakfast and dinner..
Nice, cosy place away from hustle and bustle of the city. Good to relax with family and eat home made food. Fish served on request.

reviews.text:
Location is good but place needs renovation.
Only good about my stay was AC in working condition.
Improvements needed on - Room cleanliness, Windows, Bathroom (WC) leakage, bathroom window glasses, Curtains.
Place is very beautiful, it's 5 minutes walkable from dabhol jetty port and manger is kind and humble, maintenance and service was awesome, nice place to stay and roam.
Best resort I have visited today.The receptionist were really helpful & friendly.very Good place.
It was a nice experience to stay in Suyash Resort. Excellent service...👌👌👌
